title: H2O coefficient in balanced eqn - LiHCO3 + H2SO4

content.prompt:
. . . LiHCO3(aq) + . . . H2SO4(aq) â†’ . . . Li2SO4(aq) + . . . H2O(l) + . . . CO2(g)

When the equation above is balanced and the coefficients are reduced to lowest whole-number terms, what is the coefficient of H2O(l) ?

skill.text: 5.E: Determine a balanced chemical equation for a given chemical phenomenon.
